text: Mount Holly is a township in Burlington County, New Jersey, United States. It is the county seat of Burlington CountyNew Jersey County Map, New Jersey Department of State. Accessed July 10, 2017. as well as an eastern suburb of Philadelphia. As of the 2020 United States Census, the township's population was 9,981. ==References== Category:County seats in New Jersey Category:Townships in New Jersey
title: Mount Holly, New Jersey
